paper_abstract: In this paper, we give an explicit p-adic expansion of Sigma(j=1 (j, p)=1) (np) (-1)(j)/vertical bar j vertical bar(r)(q) as a power series in n. The coefficients are values of p-adic q-l-function for q-Euler numbers.
paper_title: Explicit p-adic q-expansion for the alternating sums of powers
